com.fatwire.gst.foundation.facade.assetapi
Class ConditionParser

java.lang.Object
  com.fatwire.gst.foundation.facade.assetapi.ConditionParser

public class ConditionParser
extends Object

Builds up a Condition from a string.

Sample query strings are:

  • name='foo'
  • name = 'foo'
  • name = foo
  • name= 'foo bar'
  • size=[1,2]
  • size{10,250}
  • name!='foo'
Whitespace is not significant outside single quotes.

Since:
Mar 29, 2011
Author:
Dolf Dijkstra
